basics.name: Cris Javier
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

work.summary: Sales support, and cashiering assistance. Assist with various store operations
highlights: Summed up, updated, and collect inventory
Lead and attended to many of the different departments such as Supplies, Clothing, Textbooks and Customer Service

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Valedictorian
awards.summary: Placed at the top of my highschool in terms of GPA.
